entity.description: White House Press Secretary Sarah Huckabee Sanders

text:
@PressSec @THEHermanCain He went to Trump's rally in Tulsa and didn't wear a mask.  Two weeks later, he was diagnosed with Coronavirus.

Will Trump attend his funeral, since he essentially killed him?
